name: Upgrader (lunaticpublishing)
description:
This is a early access build in support of the full game we are in progress building 4 dlcs which will be included in the full game. 

Welcome to upgrader- A roguelike game with a inventory system and perks on level up  8 levels currently! Developed by Socks Studio- We are working on the dlcs which will raise the price for the full game to 9.99$ I currently am working on the release of the game on steam as well. We are using this build to fund raise but will release the dlcs as they come out! We are working on other games as well so please support us we want to build more games in the future.
